company_command.name: Company Command
company_command.description: A higher-ranking field officer trained to command more units and occasionally direct field operations.

platoon_command.name: Platoon Command
platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Artillery Observer
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

recon_squad.name: Sissi Recon Squad
recon_squad.description: A group of aggressive recon troops.

combat_engineers.name: Combat Engineers
combat_engineers.description: A squad of finnish combat engineers.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

at_rifle_team.name: AT Rifle Team
at_rifle_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting lighter tanks.

tank_hunters.name: Tank Hunters
tank_hunters.description: A team dedicated to hunting tanks with anti-tank grenades.

panzershreck_team.name: Panzerschreck Team
panzershreck_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

light_mortar_team.name: Light Mortar Team
light_mortar_team.description: A light mortar carried by a small team.

medium_mortar_team.name: Medium Mortar Team
medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

heavy_mortar_team.name: Heavy Mortar Team
heavy_mortar_team.description: A heavy mortar carried by a small team.

150mm_nebelwerfer.name: 150mm Nebelwerfer 41
150mm_nebelwerfer.description: A wheeled light rocket artillery piece.

ba_10.name: BA-10
ba_10.description: A recon armored car with light anti-tank support.

t26a.name: T-26A
t26a.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t26b.name: T-26B
t26b.description: An early-war light tank with a few variants with different capabilities.

t26b_command.name: T-26B (Command)
t26b_command.description: An early-war light tank with a few variants with different capabilities.

t_28.name: T-28 "Postivaunu / Postijuna"
t_28.description: An early large tank with with many armaments.

ot_34.name: OT-34
ot_34.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

ot_34_85.name: OT-34/85
ot_34_85.description: A medium tank with a heavy gun.

bt_42.name: BT-42
bt_42.description: A light tank with exceptionally high speed for breakthroughs and encirclement.

bt_5_bt_7.name: BT-5, BT-7
bt_5_bt_7.description: A light tank with exceptionally high speed for breakthroughs and encirclement.

t34.name: T-34 "Sotka"
t34.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t34_command.name: T-34 "Sotka" (Command)
t34_command.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t34_85.name: T-34/85 "Pitkäputkinen Sotka"
t34_85.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

stug_III_g.name: Stug III G "Sturmi"
stug_III_g.description: A medium tank with a fixed powerful main gun.

kv1.name: KV-1 "Klimi"
kv1.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

kv1_command.name: KV-1 "Klimi" (Command)
kv1_command.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

panzer_iv_j.name: Panzer IV J
panzer_iv_j.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

t_20_komsomolets.name: T-20 Komsomolets
t_20_komsomolets.description: A light tankette with transport capacity on top for moving small units of infantry.

assault!.name: Charge! - Rynnäkkön!
assault!.flavor: A swift and deadly end to a fight can come with a furious charge.
assault!.description: Use when a Finnish _Infantry_ unit declares a Charge action. It gets +3" of Movement for that action.

forward_rush.name: Closing Fire - Syöksyen Eteenpäin
forward_rush.flavor: With a quick dash and an alert overwatch, Infantry can cover a lot of ground carefully.
forward_rush.description: Use after a Finnish Infantry moves. It may take a free Standby action.

motti_tactics.name: Motti Tactics
motti_tactics.flavor: Encirclement tactics, can be highly effective in surprising and destroying enemies.
motti_tactics.description: Select an _Infantry_ unit to be placed in _outflanking reserves_. That unit may arrive on any table edge including your opponents reinforcement edge.

white_death.name: White Death
white_death.description: This model gets +1 Accuracy and all shooting attacks gain +1 AP.

tank_jager.name: Tank Jager
tank_jager.description: This model gains +7 AP when attacking a tank with melee attacks.

crack_shot.name: Crack Shot
crack_shot.description: This unit get +1 Accuracy and enemies hit by his attacks add one to rolls on damage tables.

natural_leader.name: Natural Leader
natural_leader.description: This unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" get +1 Courage and +1 Initiative.

no_retreat.name: No Retreat
no_retreat.description: When a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" fails a Courage test, that unit may remove one model to re-roll the test. This effect may be used once per _Infantry_ unit.

inspiring_tank_commander.name: Inspiring Tank Commander
inspiring_tank_commander.description: This unit and friendly _Tank_ or _Armored Car_ units within 6" get +1 Courage and +1 Initiative.

battle_hardened.name: Battle Hardened
battle_hardened.description: This model may subtract one from any rolls on Damage Tables.

medical_assistant.name: Medical Assistant
medical_assistant.description: Whenever this model, or a friendly Infantry model within 6" fails a save, roll a D10. On a 4 or less that save is not failed.

einar_schadewitz.name: Einar Schadewitz
einar_schadewitz.flavor: Einar Schadewitz was known for his bravery when he jumped on top of an enemy tank and disabled it with a hand grenade.
einar_schadewitz.description: Upgrade one Tank Hunter model with Tank Jager.

simo_hayha.name: Simo Häyhä
simo_hayha.flavor: Simo Häyhä was a feared finnish sniper during the winter war.
simo_hayha.description: Upgrade one Sniper model with White Death.

toivo_ilomaki.name: Toivo Ilomäki
toivo_ilomaki.flavor: Toivo Ilomäki was a practiced and skilled anti-tank gunner who was responsible for killing many Soviet vehicles throughout the war.
toivo_ilomaki.description: Upgrade one Anti-Tank Artillery model with Crack Shot.

lauri_torni.name: Lauri Törni
lauri_torni.flavor: Lauri Törni was an excellent leader during the Continuation War who draw the attention of many Soviet units in the war.
lauri_torni.description: Upgrade one Officer model with Natural Leader.
